full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Professional Services

## Background
The National Capital Commission (NCC) is a federal Crown corporation responsible for long-term planning and management of federal lands and properties within the National Capital Region, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The NCC aims to provide high-quality services to support its multifaceted activities.

## Request for Standing Offer
The NCC invites quotations from experienced and reputable contractors to provide professional services for Program and Project Management (PPM) on an "as and when requested" basis. Successful suppliers will be awarded a maximum of five (5) Standing Offers for a period of three (3) years from the date of award or until a total expenditure level is reached, whichever comes first.

## Solicitation Number
The solicitation number for this RFSO is KG001. Interested suppliers must register their interest and submit a quotation in response to this RFSO.

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation process will assess the combination of both the technical merit and price of the quotations received. A resulting_SHORTLIST of suppliers will be shortlisted, and a Standing Offer will be issued to the selected supplier(s).

## Eligibility and Exclusion
Only suppliers who have capacities to perform all the requirements of the Standing Offer are eligible and qualified for participation. However exclusion may be made where potential conflicts of interest exist.

## Enquiries
All enquiries in relation to this RFSO should be directed to the designated procurement official, Karim Ghomri. The official will respond to all written enquiries received within the solicitation period. Kindly note that all communications must be in written form via email to ensure consistency and quality of information provided to all proponents.

## Submission of Quote
Quotations must be submitted electronically in accordance with the requirements stated in the solicitation documents. The solicitation documents, including this RFSO, may be accessed on the government elektronical tendering service website.

## Important Dates

* Solicitation date: 2024-04-09
* Tender closing date: 2024-05-13 at 15:00:00
* Expected contract start date: Upon standing offer issuance

Please refer to the allocated means of submission for details on the quoting process. The National Capital Commission looks for adaptable, fair, and INCORPORATING Systems enterprise architects, business analysts, Project control technicians, contract managers, and certified engineering managers who can provide professional program and project management with agile methodologies. Please contact Karim Ghomri,  [karim.gh
